Control Name: OPS 5.4 Use build and deployment management systems
Control Statement: Use build and deployment management systems. These systems reduce errors caused by manual processes and reduce the level of eﬀort to deploy changes.

control_attributes.Control: OPS 5.4 Use build and deployment management systems
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you reduce defects, ease remediation, and improve ﬂow into production?
